description: Try our easy to follow Peanut Butter Ice-Cream Sandwiches recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Ice-cream sandwich,High protein,Seafood free,Low salt,Chocolate,Sesame free,Quick & easy dessert
name: Peanut Butter Ice-Cream Sandwiches Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Line base and sides of a 18x28cm shallow pan with 2 layers of plastic wrap.

Place peanut butter and honey in the bowl of an electric mixer and whisk until well combined. Add custard to mixture and whisk to combine and loosen mixture. Add cream and whisk on high until firm peaks form.
Pour ice-cream mixture into prepared pan and smooth top. Freeze ice-cream for 2 hours or until just set. Cover with plastic wrap and freeze a further 4 hours or until completely set.

Turn ice-cream out of pan onto a clean work surface. Using an 8cm round cutter cut out 6 rounds. Roll sides in grated chocolate to coat. Sandwich between 2 wafers. Return to freezer until ready to serve.
